tutorialPages.messageText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "DDCFAA454EAB8C8D57EA77B866F96E60", "To move your character, press W, S, A or D.")
NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "5A2EA47D4D90B0DF19032A8D3C0BE0F7", "You can lock your character\'s heading to the camera by holding down the right mouse button.")
NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "A03D5EE7476E4FD424688E8EEEA7728B", "Approach an NPC and press F to interact with them.")
